full_description:
若对该岗位有意向可直接加微信：enson6187 并备注姓名+投递的base和岗位，我会把详细的公司和岗位信息发您+具体沟通
\n
Job Responsibilities:
\n
\n
Build and maintain data-driven models to support logistics operations, including workforce efficiency models, hub performance models, and site evaluation frameworks.
\n
Write, test, and deploy production-level code to optimize operational workflows such as parcel sorting, routing, and site productivity tracking.
\n
Collect, clean, and analyze logistics data (e.g., volume, on-time performance, labor hours) to provide actionable insights that improve efficiency and reduce costs across hubs and last-mile stations.
\n
Partner with operations and management teams to translate business needs into scalable technical solutions that enhance day-to-day logistics performance.
\n
Monitor and improve data pipelines to ensure real-time accuracy of operational metrics.
\n
Prepare dashboards, reports, and presentations to communicate operational KPIs and model outputs to stakeholders.
\n
\n
Job Requirements:
\n
\n
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Logistics, Business Analytics, or related field.
\n
Strong programming ability in Python, R, or SQL, with proven experience independently coding and deploying analytics solutions.
\n
High sensitivity to operational and logistics data; ability to identify patterns, risks, and opportunities in large datasets.
\n
Familiarity with logistics/warehouse operations, including hub & last-mile delivery processes, is highly desirable.
\n
Solid skills in building models to support labor planning, hub capacity management, and site-level performance evaluation.
\n
\n
Job Type: Full-time
\n
Pay: $22.00 - $23.00 per hour
\n
Benefits:
\n
\n
401(k)
\n
401(k) matching
\n
Health insurance
\n
Paid time off
\n
Relocation assistance
\n
\n
Language:
\n
\n
Chinese (Required)
\n
\n
Work Location: In person
